name: Magical Girl Mary VS E.V.I.L. (C64)
description:
This game is for the Commodore 64 or TheC64Maxi/Mini and any Good C64 Emulator like Micro64/Vice/Etc.

Magical Girl Mary Vs E.V.I.L., Made with the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software, Use a Joystick in Port 2 to move Mary and Fire Button to Shoot, This is a Push Scroll Game so moving forward will scroll the screen and you can only fire forward, Also 1 Player Only Game, Have Fun.

Leave a Comment if you like the Game, It might edge me to Make More Games for the C64/TheC64Maxi/Mini.
